messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] HURRICANE help needed
messages.msgSnippet: Our home is open,... but I am afraid we are a little bit too far in Southeastern Minnesota! Alex and Family ... From: Ren Allen To:
messages.messageBody:
Our home is open,... but I am afraid we are a little bit too far in Southeastern Minnesota!
Alex and Family
----- Original Message -----
From: Ren Allen
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, August 31, 2005 5:53 PM
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] HURRICANE help needed


I just want everyone here to know that Denise is a legit unschooler,
someone I would totally be happy to have in my home! If anyone can help
them it would be wonderful. I wish you could come stay with us in
P'cola Denise, I'm afraid there's no way to get here though.

Has anyone heard from Valerie Fitzenreiter? She's in Lake Charles, also
on the coast near the area Katrina hit.
Can anyone get money to Denise if we sent some? Please let us know.

If anyone in that area evacuated to the East or North, there are homes
in Pensacola you are welcome to camp in! Many in our group are happy to
host displaced families if you can get to us. Please write me if you
could use a place down here to stay.

Ren




SPONSORED LINKS Secondary school education Graduate school education Home school education
Graduate school education online High school education Chicago school education
